sense.def:
To recover from an illness or an injury
pomeni biti spet pri močeh po bolezni ali poškodbi.

seg.quote: ...a wound from which he did not recover.
It was weeks before he fully recovered.
Stay at home until you are fully recovered.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
recovers from an unhappy or unpleasant experience
, ni več prizadet zaradi nesrečnega ali neprijetnega dogodka.

seg.quote: They took a long time to recover from this shock.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
recovers something
, dobi nazaj nekaj, kar so mu ukradli ali kar je izgubil.

seg.quote: I would do my best to recover these documents.
They recovered her body from the old mine-shaft.

sense.def:
To recover one's former mental or physical state
ali
to recover the ability to do something
pomeni povrniti se v prejšnje umsko ali telesno stanje ali znova biti sposoben za nekaj.

seg.quote: He was beginning to recover the use of his voice.
